lines.text:
[Seeing sailing ship approach]
This time is no derelict; Eve...
You will go! If you stay out of pity, I will throw myself in sea.
Eve!
I can only be happy if you are happy.
Have you ever fought with your fists, Ben?
Yes.
I don't mean vulgar scuffling in the stables. I mean the rules of the prize ring.
No, sir.
Take off your coat, and your education will begin.
[as Ben is removing his coat, Sir Arthur suddenly punches him to the ground]
Your first lesson - Never be taken unawares!

[raising fork up inside her fist]
What's this?
It's to eat with.
[seeing Eve fail to pick up any food]
[laughs]
No, no, no; like this.

[failing to pick up food again, at Ben laughing]
Why?
Go on, try again!
No; I am too stup'!
No, perhaps I am the one that's stupid.
[looks at utensils]
These things have no place here.

How would you like to live with me at Breetham? A gunsmith's forge is no place for a Blake. Plague take me, you have the blood if you were born on the wrong side of the blanket! You'll be brought up as a gentleman.
